title: Firefox window display offset on linux
content:
Sometimes when I start Firefox maximized. The whole window has an offset on the display (to the mouse).

So you have to click as if the window would be over the full display height, but it starts lower.

Clicking on windowed, does correct the problem, then you can maximize again (Which also works)

See https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2tnyxVwpC0E
creator: jo.spam89

title: Website Not Opening On Firefox Due To Malware Threats/Security Issues
content: Hi, I am working on this ecommerce website. When I try to open it on Firefox (Windows 10) it is giving malware threat. I want to ask is my site hacked or there is some other problem?
creator: ch27689014325

title: I cannot log onto accounts.firefox.com
content: I tried to copying and pasting the email code in and it says wrong code try again. I have tried multiple times and it won't work. Then I tried forget password and tried to use a recovery code to reset my account in an attempt to restart it like a computer but that does not work. I cannot add 2AF to my account. Any help appreciated. It also seems to be recognizing a email that I no longer use. I have had this problem in the past but ignored.
creator: Noah.Pederson2

title: Extreme Slowness
content: Filling MonkeySurvey forms or any large form in Firefox(browser is updated, version 90.0(64-bit)) is extremely slow and frustrating. Words appear in the field 2-3 sec later after typing.
creator: rahul99kaurav

title: Firefox will not save passwords
content:
I currently have FF 90.0 (64 bit). Three updates ago (several weeks) all my passwords disappeared. They are not in another profile. I can't save any passwords either. How can I fix this? Thanks

Jim
creator: theelevatorguy

title: Why does FF90 blacks out tabs
content: Just one simple question. Who was the idiot who thought it would be cute to black out / hide tabs? Is the fool a reject from redmond?
creator: RealGomer

title: Bookmarks did not transfer properly
content:
I reset my Firefox browser and my bookmarks did not transfer over properly. They are all there but you can only access them by clicking Bookmarks>Manage Bookmarks after which all my bookmarks appear in the favorites bar in the proper order and fully functional on the left side of the pop up window. Then there are a bunch of duplicated folders.

Is there a way for me to put the favorites bar back in the bookmarks tab on the right side of the page?
creator: hillmann1954
